salesRecommendation.reasoning: Alliance University exhibits a very strong tech focus with dedicated schools for Advanced Computing and Applied Engineering, numerous tech-centric Centres of Excellence (e.g., IoT, Robotics, Cyber Security, AI), and corporate engagements centered on modern IT technologies and certifications.
